area_name: Little Hunk - NE Face (Shady Grove Wall)

climbs.name: Swain-Buckey
climbs.fa: Todd Swain and Peggy Buckey, March 1988

content.description: This route has steep, fun face moves.  The two most difficult sections involve climbing past bulges.
content.protection: Four bolts (3/8") plus gear for a belay
content.location: This climb lies roughly in the middle of the face.  It starts from the left side of a boulder.

climbs.name: Shady Grove
climbs.fa: Alan Bartlett, Alan Roberts, Todd Gordon & Don Reid, February 1988

content.description: Start from ground level and climb past closely spaced bolts to reach the right end of a ledge midway up the route, then continue up the featured face above on more widely spaced bolts to the top. Two stars out of five.
content.protection: 4 bolts (3/8"), gear to 3+ inches for the anchor
content.location:
Just right of

Playing Hooky

and the furthest right route on the wall.

content.description: This is the leftmost route on the wall.  Just off the ground there is difficult edging on clean holds through two bolts.  Easier climbing up and slightly right ends with more hard moves just below to top.
content.protection: Four bolts (5/16"), light rack.  No fixed anchor.
content.location:
Left of

Return of the Chuckwalla

and the left-most route on the wall.

climbs.name: Return of the Chuckwalla
climbs.fa: Don Wilson and Dave Wonderly, March 1988

content.description: A boulder problem start off the ground gains the first bolt and then run-it-out to a horizontal (gear), another bolt, another horizontal (gear) and another runout to the top. The bolts are where you need them but unfortunately until they get replaced they aren't the most reliable. Two stars out of five.
content.protection: 2 bolts (1/4"), gear to 3 inches for the anchor
content.location:
Located between

Revenge of the Chuckwalla

and

Swain-Buckey

in the center of the wall.

climbs.name: Playing Hooky
climbs.fa: Alan Bartlett and Alan Roberts, February 1988

content.description: Starting from a large boulder at the base climb up past a bolt on a dark shield of rock to reach a ledge and then continue up the featured face above passing two more bolts and finishing just right of a slanting crack near the top. Two stars out of five.
content.protection: 3 bolts (3/8"), gear to 3 inches for the anchor
content.location:
Located between

Swain-Buckey

and

Shady Grove

on the right side of the wall.

pathTokens: Little Hunk - NE Face (Shady Grove Wall)
